00031 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';

00037 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';

00041 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'w');

00043 if (!$can_read) {

00050     <?php echo strtoupper(__('Stock Take Log')); ?>

00052     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00053     <input type="text" name="keywords" size="30" />

00060 /* STOCK TAKE LOGS LIST */
00061 // table spec
00062 $table_spec = 'system_log AS sl';
00063 
00064 // create datagrid
00065 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00066 $datagrid->setSQLColumn(
00067     'sl.log_date AS \'Time\'',
00068     'sl.log_msg AS \'Message\'');
00069 $datagrid->setSQLorder("sl.log_date DESC");
00070 
00071 $criteria = 'sl.log_location=\'stock_take\' AND sl.log_msg LIKE \'Stock Take ERROR%\' ';
00072 // is there any search
00073 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00074     $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00075     $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00076     if (count($words) > 1) {
00077         $concat_sql = ' (';
00078         foreach ($words as $word) {
00079             $concat_sql .= " (sl.log_date LIKE '%$word%' OR sl.log_msg LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00080         }
00081         // remove the last AND
00082         $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00083         $concat_sql .= ') ';
00084         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria.' AND '.$concat_sql);
00085     } else {
00086         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria." AND sl.log_date LIKE '%$keyword%' OR sl.log_msg LIKE '%$keyword%'");
00087     }
00088 }
00089 $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00090 
00091 // set table and table header attributes
00092 $datagrid->icon_edit = SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/edit.gif';
00093 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00094 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00095 // set delete proccess URL
00096 $datagrid->delete_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00097 $datagrid->column_width = array('18%', '82%');
00098 $datagrid->disableSort('Message');
00099 
00100 // put the result into variables
00101 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 50, false);
00102 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00103     $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00104     echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00105 }
00106 
00107 echo $datagrid_result;
00108 /* main content end */
00109 
00110 ?>
